sources.title: Old Barn, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page

metadata.Plot: A motley collection of guests and regulars at a country hotel are anxious one dark and stormy night when they hear by a radio news bulletin that a dangerous criminal has just broke jail and is headed their way. A surly mystery man answering the description shows up, and then hides out in a nearby barn.
metadata.Writer: John A. Waldron, Earle Rodney, Hampton Del Ruth
metadata.Actors: Johnny Burke, Daphne Pollard, Andy Clyde
